an8.41:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an8.41:5.1: “Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato, bhikkhave, uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso mahājutiko mahāvipphāro.
an8.41:5.2: Kathaṃ upavuttho ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso mahājutiko mahāvipphāro?
an8.41:5.4: ‘yāvajīvaṃ arahanto pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthā lajjī dayāpannā, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampino viharanti.
an8.41:5.5: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharāmi.
an8.41:5.6: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:5.7: Iminā paṭhamena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (1)
an8.41:6.1: ‘Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭiviratā dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharanti.
an8.41:6.2: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharāmi.
an8.41:6.3: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:6.4: Iminā dutiyena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (2)
an8.41:7.1: ‘Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto abrahmacariyaṃ pahāya brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an8.41:7.2: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ abrahmacariyaṃ pahāya brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an8.41:7.3: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:7.4: Iminā tatiyena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (3)
an8.41:8.1: ‘Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭiviratā saccavādino saccasandhā thetā paccayikā avisaṃvādako lokassa.
an8.41:8.2: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato saccavādī saccasandho theto paccayiko avisaṃvādako lokassa.
an8.41:8.3: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:8.4: Iminā catutthena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (4)
an8.41:9.2: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato.
an8.41:9.3: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:9.4: Iminā pañcamena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (5)
an8.41:10.2: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ ekabhattiko rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā.
an8.41:10.3: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:10.4: Iminā chaṭṭhena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (6)
an8.41:11.2: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ naccagītavāditavisūkadassanamālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya naccagītavāditavisūkadassanamālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā paṭivirato.
an8.41:11.3: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:11.4: Iminā sattamena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (7)
an8.41:12.1: ‘Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ pahāya uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭiviratā nīcaseyyaṃ kappenti—
an8.41:12.3: Ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ pahāya uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭivirato nīcaseyyaṃ kappemi—
an8.41:12.5: Imināpaṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an8.41:12.6: Iminā aṭṭhamena aṅgena samannāgato hoti. (8)
an8.41:13.1: Evaṃ upavuttho kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso mahājutiko mahāvipphāro”ti.
